channel.title: NMS:PLTR on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NMS:PLTR on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Palantir’s 525% Stock Surge Makes CTO Shyam Sankar the Firm’s Fifth Billionaire
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc.’s unstoppable rally the past year has yielded more than sixfold gains for investors, and created monumental wealth for its founders and early employees.
